analysis.description:
WSPXCrowdsale.getTotalAmountOfTokens (/unique_contracts/0xef69369f6ed0b0e3551f45efa942b164fdff81ea.sol#409-444) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- currentPeriod == 1
	- currentPeriod == 2
	- currentPeriod == 3

MintableToken.claimTokens (/unique_contracts/0xef69369f6ed0b0e3551f45efa942b164fdff81ea.sol#288-302) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_contracts/0xef69369f6ed0b0e3551f45efa942b164fdff81ea.sol#298-299)

Crowdsale.hardWeiCap should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xef69369f6ed0b0e3551f45efa942b164fdff81ea.sol#318-319)
ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xef69369f6ed0b0e3551f45efa942b164fdff81ea.sol#63-65)
ERC20.transfersEnabled should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xef69369f6ed0b0e3551f45efa942b164fdff81ea.sol#65)
WSPXCrowdsale.addressFundBounty should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xef69369f6ed0b0e3551f45efa942b164fdff81ea.sol#342-343)
